Safe & Sharp Clipping Blade — Sharp stainless steel and ceramic blade,with round head design,you can do the grooming at home easily and safely.
Washable & USB Rechargeable — Large capacity lithium-ion battery,can be charged via USB cable anytime,you can trim you pet in the garden or any other outdoor occasions.The blade is detachable and washable directly under the water tab,you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Long Time Power Supply — The pet clipper built-in powerful & rechargeable lithium-ion battery,it can work 90 minutes of cordless operating after 3 hours fully charged,it can keep home pet grooming running continuously,no more worries about power off when working.
Warm Tips for Pet Trimming — If your pets have thick and long coats, please do use the scissor to cut shorter firstly. Or else the clipper may get jammed up while trimming.

TOSY 36 and 360 LEDs Frisbee – Extremely Bright Flying Disc, Smart Modes, Glow in The Dark, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, 175g, Perfect Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teenagers
36 SUPER BRIGHT LEDs – 100x brighter than any other light-up discs! Our black plastic disc looks super cool, while the white plastic disc gives you more visibility at night when you throw it outdoor.
SMART MODES & MOTION SENSORS – Easily select the Brightness level and Timer mode you want. LEDs light turns on and off automatically for battery-saving.
RECHARGEABLE – 30-minute charge that lasts up to a thousand throws or a full Ultimate match of 90 minutes. Package includes 1x USB Type C to C cable (charger not included).
175 GRAMS – Our disc meets the Professional Ultimate Frisbee standards for long, straight, precise flights and highly comfortable grip. It is great for freestyle tricks too!
UPGRADE YOUR GAME – Spice up your Christmas shopping list and favorite Frisbee bottle and tossing games (Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes or others) with our highly durable, waterproof and premium discs!

item.title: HOTO Precision Electric Screwdriver Set, 25 in 1 Magnetic Driver Bits Set, Rechargeable Screwdriver Tool Set, S2 Steel, Repair Tool Kit for Precision Electronics
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)



HIGH-QUALITY PRECISION BITS: Come with 25 precision bits and 10 mainstream types, which can meet daily maintenance needs. All screwdriver bits are made of S2 steel with a hardness of up to 60HRC. Compare with CR-V, S2 steel has the advantages of high strength, wear resistance, and corrosion resistance. Every bit is machined with high precision to avoid damaging the screw. Specially used for precision object disassembly, such as repairing computers/tablets/game consoles/cameras/watches, etc.
ADVANCED APPEARANCE: Extremely textured aluminum alloy frosted appearance, bringing you a delicate touch. Electric screwdriver dark gray appearance design brings advanced visual experience. Aluminum shell surface treated with anodic oxidization, anti-sweat, and anti-corrosion. PC+ABS high-strength engineering plastic shell bottom, sturdy and durable. Stylish, high-end precision screwdriver set is the perfect gift.
BUILT-IN MAGNETIZER MAGNETIZATION ANY TIME: The storage box has an integrated magnetization area design, which can be magnetized at any time for the equipped bits and any screwdrivers to better absorb precision screws. The practical magnetic design aims to save time and effort. Small torque setting keeps you from over-tightening screws. HOTO useful precision screwdriver set is a decent gift for both professional and amateur.
EASY USE & PORTABLE MAGNETIC BOX: HOTO electric screwdriver with all-aluminum alloy non-slip shell, surface three-dimensional texture design, make the grip more stable and less slippery. The front end of the screwdriver has a built-in magnet, and the batch head is magnetically installed for quick replacement. One-button start design, easy to use, even users with zero experience can easily operate. TPU soft rubber material buttons, provide a comfortable feel.
TYPE-C & PORTABLE BOX: Type-C charging port, suitable for charging cables of various electronic products, enabling charging anytime, anywhere. Comes with a storage box, lightweight and compact design makes it easy to put in a bag and carry outdoors. The magnetic design makes it much easier to use and prevents the loss of the bit. Precision screwdriver built-in 350mAh lithium battery with long battery life. The battery can punch 500 screws once fully charged.

4.5
Price: $69.99 - $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:38 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:29 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Powered by the wave of Smart Home, we are keen to linking every of our DIY lovers with smart tools in a simple manner.

Our vision is to empower the imagnation through continuous innovation of our technology!

GoGonova Hot Glue Gun&Heat Gun

DIYer’s Choices

Multi-purposed Tool

【3 Adjustable Speeds】- GoGonova cordless rotary tool can realize 3 variable speeds (5000/12000/18000 RPM), it allows you to adjust and control the polishing speed precisely to meet the power of different scenarios, making your artwork DIY creation a quite easy thing. With different materials like wood, soft metal, plastic, stone, the miracle creation is right on your hands!
【Ergonomic & Compact Design】- Amazingly compact size and rubber wrapped around the body makes the tool easy to grip and control. The keyless chuck promise a simple and tool-free replacement. This makes them perfect not only for a wide range of household tasks, including repairs and maintenance, but also for crafting and hobbies. There are even rotary tool attachments designed to care for pets’ toenails.
【Overload Protection】- The tool body is designed with several vent holes, which helps to dissipate the heat continuously for longer time using. Moreover, the overload protection system would stop the motor in case of unanticipated situations. The groove power button design of this rotary tool help you get rid of worrying about stopping the rotating by touching the switch accidentally.
【ALL-IN-ONE With 43 Accessories】- One little tool for multiple purposes! This rotatory tool come with 43 accessories is perfect for a variety of light-duty handy works. Grinding, polishing, curving, sanding, engraving and more light projects, all your need is this convenient all-in-one tool.
【Fantastic Deal】- 1 x GoGonova 4V Cordless Rotatory Tool; 1 x Storage Box; 43 x Accessories; 1 x USB-C Cable; 1 x Manual.
** KIND REMINDER – This cordless rotary tool is designed for LIGHT-DUTY works only.

  • 15* Sanding Paper & 8* Sanding Bands
  • 5* Cut for Wheels
  • 5* Grinding Stones
  • 5* Diamond Wheel Points
  • 1* Mandrel for Sanding Bands & 1* Mandrel for Cut-off Wheel
  • 1* Hss Cutter, 1* Steel Brush
  • 1* Felt Tip With Shank
  • 1* USB-C Charging Cable

GoGonova 4V Rotary Tool

Why do users stick with GoGonova?

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Our vision is to empower the imagination through continuous innovation of our technology.

  • Light Weight – 1.2 lbs
  • 3 Speed Adjustments – Up to 18,000 RPM
  • Ergonomic Design – Comfortable Grip
  • Ventilation Mechanism – Smooth Using Experience
  • Multi-Purpose – Kit with 43 accessories available for grinding, engraving, cutting, polishing, sanding, cleaning and more!

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand oneisall Founded in 2012 oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. “oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.99 - $27.05
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 7.52 x 2.44 inches; 1.23 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 26225202-003DE
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required.
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HRSZRXM

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Read more

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 1

It’s not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog’s eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 2

Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 3

Pay attention to trimming the dog’s ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 4

Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don’t cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.31 x 5.51 x 2.8 inches; 15.84 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 30, 2007
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Highdas
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07SSRDCHT

★RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES – Rechargeable clippers can make it flexible for you. It is no problem to use when charging, don’t worry, and it is safe and will not stop working.
★SAFE AND SHARP BLADE – It is suitable for the most skin-friendly grooming experience, and thanks to the precision-cut titanium blades, there’s no uncomfortable pulling at your pet’s hair.
★EASY TO USE AND ADJUSTABLE – We have 4 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
★PAY ATTENTION – Using the scissors to cut the hair shorter first if your pet has a extremely long and thick hair cause it will make the clippers get stuck and stop working.

Four Size Combs

√ 3 - 6- 9 - 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS - 1

  • It's not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog's eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS - 2

  • Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS - 3

  • Pay attention to trimming the dog's ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS - 4

  • Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don't cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Read more

4.5

Product Description

Why choose Vanexiss Car Sun Visor Mirror？

— Ordinary mirror: Insufficient brightness, heavy makeup

— Vanexiss fill light mirror: Bright and clear

Do you encounter such troubles in the car?

Forgot to bring your vanity mirror

– The car is too dark

– Not enough light Car rearview mirror

– Too high and too far

For this I recommend it for you – Vanexiss Car Makeup Mirror with Light

Dimmable Color LED Lights

Including 3 color lighting modes and stepless dimming function, which can be dimmed or intensified for your needs. Long press for dimming according to what you need.

USB RECHARGEABLE

Built-in 1800 mAh lithium battery, which can be charged by car, socket, computer, mobile power, free to use the vanity mirror at anywhere and anytime.

UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN

The size of makeup mirror is 10.2(L)*5.3(W)*0.4(H) inch, which suits for most of the sun visor of cars.

SMART DOUBLE TOUCH CONTROL DESIGN

There are two touch sensors, simply touch one of touch switches to turn on and off. You can switch the two colors of the lights(cool white, warm yellow). Long press to adjust the brightness of the lights.

The best gift for your families and lovers.

DIMMABLE COLOR LED LIGHTS – Your mirror goes in the sun visor, so the light is even on your face. You can doing your makeup with this mirror with flawless results because of the impeccable lighting. Including 3 color lighting modes and stepless dimming function, which can be dimmed or intensified for your needs. Long press for dimming according to what you need.
USB RECHARGEABLE – Built-in 1800 mAh lithium battery, which can be charged by car, socket, computer, mobile power, free to use the vanity mirror at anywhere and anytime. It can last 8 hours if 100% brightness while always On mode.
SMART DOUBLE TOUCH CONTROL DESIGN – There are two touch sensors, simply touch one of touch switches to turn on and off. You can switch the two colors of the lights(cool white, warm yellow). Long press to adjust the brightness of the lights. Memory function makes this mirror with lights return to the same brightness and color when you last using.
UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN – The size of makeup mirror is 8(L)*5(W)*0.35(H) inches, which suits for most of the sun visor of cars. Compact and lightweight design, easy to install and use, does not take up extra space inside the cars.
Customers satisfaction is our top priority! If you are not satisfied with the visor makeup mirror or any issues, please contact us freely, we provide lifetime warranty.

item.title: GHG Dog Nail Grinder Upgraded – Professional LED Lighting 3-Speed Rechargeable Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers, Quiet Low Noise, Paws Grooming and Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs and Cats
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light

Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.

Get used to grinder

Step 1: Turn on the grinder and accustom your dog to the sound and smell, to avoid scaring your pet. Once your pets get used to it, the grinding work will be easy.

Cut the long nail

Step 2: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails.

Apply the grinder

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 60 oblique, Put pet’s nail gently into port hole with your fingers.

Reward your pet

Step 4: After finishing grinding, reward your pet with pet snacks it will have a good memory of the nail grinder.

Appropriate Angle

The perfect time to do claw grooming work after bathing, because their nails would be softer than usual and easier to trim. 45 degrees is a perfect angle for you to smooth pet’s nails.

（Do not sharpen one nail for too long to avoid heat buildup）

Low Noise Grinder

Our pet nail grinder has powerful motor with low noise and vibration will won’t scare your dog. 3 ports and Low-Normal-High speed are enough for all sizes of pet nails and heavy grinding.

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1

Pet Nail Clippers * 1

USB Charging Cable * 1

User Manual * 1

Different Ports * 2

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 1.3 x 1.2 inches; 13.12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GHG
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08SMD5DMD

SUPER LOW NOISE AND VIBRATION: Used as puppy nail grinder & cat nail trimmers, GHG nail grinder for pets won’t scare your canine. Enjoy grooming at home with GHG pet nail grinder for dogs quiet(＜40dB).
BUILT-IN LED LIGHT & LIGHTWEIGHT: A special LED light below the dog nail grinder shines on your pet’s claw so you can see it better, preventing over-grinding or cutting, portable and smart design.
UP TO 10H WORKING TIME: GHG nail grinders trimmer for dogs with convenient micro-USB charging, and its super long-life rechargeable battery-operated dog nail trimmer for easier at-home grooming.
1 NAIL CLIPPER & 1 ELECTRIC NAIL TRIMMER: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails, and flexibly choose the right port and speed according to the pet’s size and nail hardness.
